pullRequest.title: Update java11_fat for java 15 testing
pullRequest.bodyText:
This PR takes care of:

Adding a couple of Java 15 specific tests to verify testing is being run at Java 15
Adding @MaximumJavaLevel=14 to the Java14Test class and @MaximumJavaLevel=15 to the Java15Test class.  Otherwise the compiled tests for other levels of Java would fail since the tests use preview features not available in any other version of Java
Reorganized the source code files for the sample war files into Java version specific directories

nodes.bodyText: since the java15-app uses preview features, we will want to cap this test to Java 15 using @MaximumJavaLevel
is this source URL correct? If it's in your personal github fork, we can just point it to your fork+branch
